attributes.action: A Public enquiry into why the Banks refuse to investigate, fraud, within their investments
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I Call for a Public Enquiry into why Banks refuse to investigate Fraud, and turn a blind eye to it.
Banks that have refused to investigate, Fraud, within their investments, the Following Banks who refuse to investigate, Fraud, Deception and abuse, carried out by one of their Investments, in this case Anglian Home Improvements.
Many reported cases of Benefit Fraud, and Employees using Bogus names and Titles in their attempt to defraud, refusing to comply with the UK Building Regulations, leaving Properties in danger of Collapse.
The banks who refuse to investigate, these are the legal owners, and are Lloyds TSB, Barclays, Bank of Scotland, Royal Bank of Scotland, Bank of America, Blue Bay Investments, and Alchemy Partners. 
i have written to Gordon brown about this, earlier this Year.
